repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a Vedānta related text. This is incomplet manuscript. One line from a Vednta-related verse is penned jñānaṃ virāgamaiśvaryatapassaṃ[tṣa?]māyutiḥ [further line is not so legible.] Some thing is written in Granth on the reverse side of the same folio. Second blank folio with benediction Nārāyaṇīsahacarāya namaśśīvāya The numbering does not continue and some margins are fractured, resulting in loss of foliation. Front guard folio with note written in Roman perhaps by V Raghavan: Śivatattvavivekavyākhyā 13 vedānta Granth 392 p. 5 L. incomplete.

msItem.title: Śivatattvavivekavyākhyā
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 [gap due to broken folio.] 1v 2 śaktākarannilakaṇdhakvaviśa upākṣatvādi viśiṣṭaśuddhasatvamayavividhavigṛhavibhrājamānaṃ
msItem.explicit: 197v 4 janmanā purītaṃ piṇḍaṃ mahākalpāṃbṛtāya[yā?] śrīnaṭādhirājāya namaḥ ..

support.p: Thick dark brown wooden cover guard folio.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 4 blank and 197 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration is the left margin. Numbering is not continues and some margins are broken so some foliation is lost.
supportDesc.condition: Good state with folio damaged at the corners.

additions.desc: jñānaṃ virāgamaiśvaryatapassaṃ[tṣa?]māyutiḥ [further line is not so legible.] is written on the front blank folio. It seems some verse related to Vedānta philosopy. Second blank folio with blessing - Nārāyaṇīsahacarāya namaśśīvāya .

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate words.

TEI.text:
1v 1 [gap due to broken folio.] 1v 2 śaktākarannilakaṇdhakvaviśa upākṣatvādi viśiṣṭaśuddhasatvamayavividhavigṛhavibhrājamānaṃ śivabhavarudramaheśvaramahādevādyanantaparyāyavidyopitamahiṃ 1v 3 vilāsaṃ sakalabhuvanasṛṣṭīsthitisaṃhārakārīṇāṃ rājasādivṛtyupādhiparikalpitasthāṃśarūpāṇāṃ …
197v 3 manantavyut[illegibel one syllable]tīyasya kānatiḥ . antaḥbahiścapūrṇasya kathamudvāsanaṃ bhavet . iyameva parāpūrṇā śaṃbhor mīnatejasaḥ kiṃ karomi tvaṃ gacchāmi kiṃ [taṇhā?]mi tyājāmi kiṃ
197v 4 janmanā purītaṃ piṇḍaṃ mahākalpāṃbṛtāya[yā?] śrīnaṭādhirājāya namaḥ ..
